title: UP: Muslim man arrested over “al-Qaeda module” gets bail after 630 days
selftext: Mohammed Moid, an accused in the Lucknow cooker bomb case, has been granted bail by the Lucknow High Court. Moid is the third accused to receive bail in this case, after Mushtaqeem and Shakeel were also granted bail earlier.
